item.title: Renew DHCP Lease on Ubuntu VM After Moving Between Wireless Networks
item.description: TL;DR sudo dhclient -r [eth0] &amp;&amp; sudo dhclient [eth0] I add that command as an alias to my ~/.bashrc file alias resetdhcp='sudo dhclient -r eth0 &amp;&amp; sudo dhclient eth0' then resourced it so I could use it in the bash session I was in source ~/.bashrc I constantly have my Ubuntu VM (VirtualBox) running on my Windows laptop and dock/undock it between work and home. Obviously those are two different wireless networks.
